channel.title: Godsword emote
channel.description: Okay im prolly not the only one that noticed this but i noticed alot of people saying for the past few months they got all godsword emotes. if you want to be technical they dont cuz there are 4 main godsword attack emotes and we only use the one for example when you do block attack emote they attack towards the feet. i just wanted to get that off my chest.
